special_text:
At the beginning of each end step, you may activate one of Sevrox's loyalty abilities if you spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn.
[+1]: Surveil 1, then draw a card.
[-3]: Destroy target creature. Its controller creates a Junk token.
[-6]: Create a token that's a copy of Sevrox, except it's not legendary
